question: Who is the head of the panel constituted to look into reforms in urban planning education system?
explanation:
NITI Aayog Vice-Chairman Rajiv Kumar is the head of the 14-member advisory committee, that will review the urban planning education system in India.
The panel will also examine the availability of qualified urban planners in the country and the challenges posed by rapid urbanization. NITI Aayog CEO Amitabh Kant and secretaries of three ministries are among the members of the committee.
